text: The diagram below represents the microsporangium in an enlarged view. Identify the parts labelled from A to D and select the correct option. A-Epidermis, B-Middle layers, C-Tapetum, D-Microspore mother cells A-Middle layers, B-Tapetum, C-Epidermis, D-Microspore mother cells A-Epidermis, B-Middle layers, C-Microspore mother cells, D-Tapetum A-Endothecium, B-Middle layers, C-Tapetum, D-Microspore mother cells
